Class ImageModel

java.lang.Object
org.supsi.model.image.ImageModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
IImageModel
public class ImageModel extends Object implements IImageModel
Represents the model for managing image data and operations. Acts as a bridge between the view and the backend controller for image-related functionality.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Throws:

      Retrieves the pixel data of the current image.
      Specified by:
      getImagePixels in interface IImageModel
      Returns:

      Writes the current image to the specified file path.
      Specified by:
      writeImage in interface IImageModel
      Parameters:
      path - the path where the image will be saved
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error writing the file
      IllegalAccessException - if access to the file writer is inaccessible

    • export

      public void export(String extension, String path) throws IOException, IllegalAccessException
      Exports the current image to the specified file path with the given file extension.
      Specified by:
      export in interface IImageModel
      Parameters:
      extension - the file extension to use for the exported image
      path - the path where the image will be exported
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error exporting the file
      IllegalAccessException - if access to the file writer is inaccessible
